en.sc1: Consider searching for the record with key value 32 in this tree. We call the getHelper method with a pointer to the BST root (the node with key value 37).

en.sc5: We make a recursive call with the left child as the new rt.

en.sc12: Now we will start unwinding the recursion, passing the record with key value 32 back up to the caller.

en.sc15: Pop the recursion one final time to return the record with value 32 back to the original caller of getHelper.
